# cmccloudv2_autoscalingv2_configuration (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cmccloudv2_volume_type" "highio" { 
    description = "High I/O" 
}

data "cmccloudv2_volume_type" "ultra" { 
    description = "Ultra High I/O" 
}

resource "cmccloudv2_autoscalingv2_configuration" "as_configuration_1" { 
    name                 		= "as_config_prod"
    source_type          		= "image"
    source_id            		= "23b8854c-581f-40aa-a05a-711d47ac6bd0"
    flavor_id            		= "6aef9929-440a-486a-a487-b1954f56cf87"
    subnet_ids           		= [ "4ca19493-e57f-407f-b3c4-ecb468adea2c" ]
    use_eip              		= true
    domestic_bandwidth   		= 500
    inter_bandwidth      		= 30
    security_group_names 		= [ "default" ]
    password             		= "}2LBgdue5ty"
    ecs_group_id         		= ""
    volumes {
        size                  	= 20
        type                  	= "${data.cmccloudv2_volume_type.highio.name}"
        delete_on_termination 	= true
    }	
    volumes {	
        size                  	= 20
        type                  	= "${data.cmccloudv2_volume_type.ultra.name}"
        delete_on_termination 	= true
    }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `flavor_id` (String) The flavor ID of the desired flavor for the server.
- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling configuration
- `source_id` (String) The source ID of image/snapshot/volume, depends on source_type
- `source_type` (String) Type of source: image, snapshot or volume
- `subnet_ids` (List of String) The ID of subnets to associate with the server.
- `use_eip` (Boolean) If true, the EIP will be used after the server is created
- `volumes` (Block List, Min: 1) The volumes for the server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--volumes))

### Optional

- `domestic_bandwidth` (Number) Domestic bandwidth in Mbps, required if use_eip is true
- `ecs_group_id` (String) The ECS group ID of the autoscaling configuration
- `inter_bandwidth` (Number) International bandwidth in Mbps, required if use_eip is true
- `key_name` (String) The name of a key pair to put on the server
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Password of server, it will be used to login to the server.
- `security_group_names` (Set of String) An array of one or more security group names to associate with the server
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))
- `user_data` (String) User data of server, it will be executed when the server is created

### Read-Only

- `created` (String) The created time of the autoscaling configuration
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--volumes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `volumes`

Required:

- `size` (Number) The size of the volume
- `type` (String) The type of the volume, eg: highio/commonio

Optional:

- `delete_on_termination` (Boolean) If true, the volume will be deleted when the instance is terminated. Default is true


<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
